features: Features the Night Panther fragrance with fresh notes of cocoa, citrus & vanilla
Provides 24-hour odour protection, in case you need to climb a mountain, fight off a bear, and ride an elevator all in the same day
Doesn't like to be confused with a roll on deodorant - our dry sticks get the job done way faster
Whether you are buying a deodrant, deoderant or deodarant, we hope you enjoy our smell-tastic scents!
description: Product Description Apply on your armpits for long-lasting scent protection. Dare we say, this is one sniffworthy scent. Night Panther exudes an invigorating fragrance that is sure to attract the attention. Old Spice Night Panther deodorant Stick strengthens your masculine power, it smells so good you'll feel confident in any situation. Banish body odour once and for all and become a modern King of the Jungle Ingredients Dipropylene Glycol, Aqua, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Stearate, Poloxamine 1307, PPG-3 Myristyl Ether, Parfum, Tetrasodium EDTA, Limonene, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Coumarin, Citronellol, Citral, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, CI 42090 Directions Apply on your armpits for long-lasting scent protection Manufacturer Contact Information Procter & Gamble UK, Weybridge, Surrey, KT13 0XP See more
